reviews.title: I like the options
reviews.review_text: The options of multiple chargers has helped charge my phone and headset at the same time at night. Very nice and ordering a new one for watch and other phone.

reviews.title: Fun color!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This Powertek Charger will charge with USB-C & USB-A . It's an attractive color, that makes it easy to find or grab when stored with additional chargers. It charges your phone fast. With having two ports, it can charge two devices at one time if you so desire. It's compact in size and can easily be carried in a backpack or purse when on the go.

reviews.title: All in one
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a pastel blue dual port wall block charger. You can charge your Iphone, Galaxy, or Pixel devices with this USB. This USB is fast charging and it's small enough to put in your pocket or purse. This is something you must have. I really recommend this product.

reviews.title: Very nice product!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received the Liquipel - Glitter 20W A/C Combo Wall Charger to try out in my home. It was a very nice surprise to see a guarantee included about "if you break it, we fix it." I liked how fast it charged and it is a quality product.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this charger box. It charges really fast and doesn't get super hot which has always been a problem before. I love how it comes with a usb and charger c option so you can charge two things at once

reviews.title: Not as advertised.
reviews.review_text: The unit I received did not have retractable cables built in. I had to buy them separately, and the prongs do not retract when not in use. If the manufacturer had spent a couple more dollars, this item could have been truly desirable.
